methods.name: close
methods.summary: Closes this result set and release resources. Once closed, the result set must no longer be used.

methods.name: field
methods.summary: Retrieves the value for the specified field in the current row, and casts it to the specified type (String, Integer, Float or Double.)
methods.description:
All of the numeric types (Integer, Float or Double) are returned as JavaScript Number objects.

If no type parameter is specified, the returned data type depends on the data in the column.

  • If the data in the column is TEXT, the data is returned as a String.
  • If the data in the column is any kind of number, the data is returned as a Number.
  • If the data in the column is a BLOB, the data is returned as a Titanium.Blob object.

When a type is specified and the data cannot be converted to the specified type, an exception is thrown.

Returns null if the value in the table is NULL.

returns.summary: return type varies based on the underlying data and optional type argument. If BLOB, we return a Titanium.Blob. If TEXT, we return String. If any kind of number, we return a Number.

methods.name: fieldByName
methods.summary: Retrieves the value for the specified field in the current row, and casts it to the specified type (String, Integer, Float or Double.)
methods.description:
All of the numeric types (Integer, Float or Double) are returned as JavaScript Number objects.

If no type parameter is specified, the returned data type depends on the data in the column.

  • If the data in the column is TEXT, the data is returned as a String.
  • If the data in the column is any kind of number, the data is returned as a Number.
  • If the data in the column is a BLOB, the data is returned as a Titanium.Blob object.

When a type is specified and the data cannot be converted to the specified type, an exception is thrown.

Returns null if the value in the table is NULL.

parameters.name: name
parameters.summary: A column name or alias used in the SQL query.

parameters.name: type
parameters.summary: Type to cast for the field value.

returns.summary: return type varies based on the underlying data and optional type argument. If BLOB, we return a Titanium.Blob. If TEXT, we return String. If any kind of number, we return a Number.

methods.name: fieldName
methods.summary: Returns the field name for the specified field index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.summary: A zero-based column index for the field.

methods.name: getFieldName
methods.summary: Returns the field name for the specified field index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.summary: A zero-based column index for the field.

methods.name: isValidRow
methods.summary: Returns whether the current row is valid.

methods.name: next
methods.summary: Advances to the next row in the result set and returns true if one exists, or false otherwise.

properties.name: fieldCount
properties.summary: The number of columns in this result set.

properties.name: rowCount
properties.summary: The number of rows in this result set.

properties.name: validRow
properties.summary: Indicates whether the current row is valid.
